00032 public class Edge implements Comparable<Edge> 
00033 {
00037     private static int nInstances = 0; 
00038     
00042     private int id; 
00043     
00047     private Node origin; 
00048     
00052     private Node end;
00053     
00057     private double costs; 
00058     
00062     private double savings; 
00063     
00067     private int inRoute = 0; 
00068     
00072     private boolean isForward = true;
00073     
00082     public Edge(Node originNode, Node endNode) 
00083     {
00084         nInstances++;
00085         id = nInstances;
00086         origin = originNode;
00087         end = endNode;
00088         costs = calcCostsEdge(origin, end);
00089         savings = calcSavingsEdge(origin, end);
00090         isForward = true;
00091     }
00092     
00099     public Edge(Edge referenceEdge) 
00100     {
00101         id = referenceEdge.id;
00102         origin = referenceEdge.origin;
00103         end = referenceEdge.end;
00104         costs = referenceEdge.costs;
00105         savings = referenceEdge.savings;
00106         isForward = referenceEdge.isForward;
00107     }
00108 
00114     public void setCosts(double edgeCosts) 
00115     {
00116         costs = edgeCosts;
00117     }
00118 
00124     public void setSavings(double edgeSavings) 
00125     {
00126         savings = edgeSavings;
00127     }
00128 
00134     public void setInRoute(int routeId) 
00135     {
00136         inRoute = routeId;
00137     }
00138 
00144     public Node getOrigin() 
00145     {
00146         if(isForward)
00147         {
00148                 return origin;
00149         }
00150         else
00151         {
00152                 return end;
00153         }
00154     }
00155 
00161     public Node getEnd() 
00162     {
00163         if(isForward)
00164         {
00165                 return end;
00166         }
00167         else
00168         {
00169                 return origin;
00170         }
00171     }
00172 
00178     public int getId() {
00179         return id;
00180     }
00181 
00187     public double getCosts() 
00188     {
00189         return costs;
00190     }
00191 
00197     public double getSavings() 
00198     {
00199         return savings;
00200     }
00201 
00209     public int getInRoute() 
00210     {
00211         return inRoute;
00212     }
00213 
00214     
00218     public void reverse() 
00219     {
00220         if(isForward)
00221         {
00222                 isForward = false;
00223         }
00224         else
00225         {
00226                 isForward = true;
00227         }
00228     }
00229     
00235     public String toString() 
00236     {
00237         String s = "";
00238         s = s.concat("\nEdge Id: " + this.getId());
00239         s = s.concat("\nEdge origin: " + this.getOrigin());
00240         s = s.concat("\nEdge end: " + this.getEnd());
00241         s = s.concat("\nEdge costs: " + (this.getCosts()));
00242         s = s.concat("\nEdge savings: " + (this.getSavings()));
00243         return s;
00244     }
00245 
00251     public int compareTo(Edge otherEdge) 
00252     {
00253         if (this.savings < otherEdge.getSavings()) 
00254         {
00255             return -1;
00256         } 
00257         else if (this.savings > otherEdge.getSavings()) 
00258         {
00259             return 1;
00260         }
00261         return -1;
00262     }
00263 
00264    
00270     public double calcCostsEdge(Node on, Node en) 
00271     {
00272         double Xo = on.getX();
00273         double Yo = on.getY();
00274         double Xe = en.getX();
00275         double Ye = en.getY();
00276 
00277         return Math.sqrt((Xe - Xo) * (Xe - Xo) + (Ye - Yo) * (Ye - Yo));
00278     }
00279 
00285     public double calcSavingsEdge(Node no, Node ne) 
00286     {
00287         double Xo = no.getX();
00288         double Yo = no.getY();
00289         double Xe = ne.getX();
00290         double Ye = ne.getY();
00291 
00292         //Cost originNode to depot
00293         double cod = Math.sqrt((0 - Xo) * (0 - Xo) + (0 - Yo) * (0 - Yo));
00294 
00295         //cost depot to endNode
00296         double cde = Math.sqrt((Xe - 0) * (Xe - 0) + (Ye - 0) * (Ye - 0));
00297 
00298         //Return cost depot to savings
00299         return cod + cde - costs;
00300 
00301     }
00302 }
